Name: Blue Cosmo
Ingredients: 45 ml White cranberry juice drink white
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This blue rinsed drink may have sales appeal but sadly is not quite as good as a traditional red Cosmo.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Cosmo contains 190 calories
